accounts_selection_view.title: Selección de cuenta
accounts_selection_view.p1: Por favor selecciona la cuenta en la que quieres logarte.

apps_view.manage_network_info_text: In this section you can manage the current integrated networks for your app and its profiless. (This will be the default list of networks you will see in the app creation & edition sections)
apps_view.remove_app_message: Escribe {number} en el campo de texto

copies.drag_and_drop: Arrastre un fichero o haga click

login_view.error: Hay un error en tu cuenta. Por favor, contacta con el equipo técnico para más ayuda.

api_key.label: Clave API
api_key.help_text: Your API key will be labeled as "Read-Only API Key" on this page - PENDING

report_key.label: Clave reporte
report_key.help_text: From your Account page, choose "Keys" in the left sidebar, then select the Report Key. If you do not see the Report Key field, email support@applovin.com and request your reporting key. - PENDING

sdk_key.label: Clave SDK
sdk_key.help_text: From your Account page choose "Keys" in the left sidebar, then select the SDK Key.-PENDING

user_id.label: ID Usuario
user_id.help_text: From the API Explorer Page, select the User ID-PENDING

user_signature.label: Firma usuario
user_signature.help_text: From the API Explorer Page, select the User Signature-PENDING

account_id.label: ID cuenta
account_id.help_text: You can find your Account ID on your InMobi Dashboard. Click the disclosure triangle in the top right to reveal your Account ID.-PENDING

api_key.label: Clave API
api_key.help_text: Email InMobi and request an API Key. Please mention that you need the API Key to use the Mobusi Mediation.-PENDING

username.label: Nombre de usuario
username.help_text: InMobi requires a username and password to access their API. If you would not like to provide your own username, you can create a new account that you give this panel access to with InMobi's Invite User feature.-PENDING

password.label: Contraseña
password.help_text: InMobi requires a username and password to access their API. If you would not like to provide your own username, you can create a new account that you give this panel access to with InMobi's Invite User feature.-PENDING

username.label: Nombre de usuario
username.help_text: The login/email that is used to login to our ironSource account.-PENDING

secret_key.label: Clave secreta
secret_key.help_text: The secret key parameter is unique for your ironSource account. To retrieve it, click on your user profile on the top right corner of the screen, and select 'My Account'. You will find the secret key in the Reporting API section-PENDING

skey.label: SKey-PENDING
skey.help_text: From the Account page, lock for the "Reporting API" section and you can find your Skey.-PENDING

secret.label: Secret-PENDING
secret.help_text: From the Account page, lock for the "Reporting API" section and you can find your Secret after validating with your password a security popup alert.-PENDING

api_key.label: Clave API
api_key.help_text: From the Reports page, check "Enable data access through API". Then click the "View API Access Details" link to reveal your API Key.-PENDING

inventory_report.label: Reporte de inventario
inventory_report.help_text: From the Reports page, click the "View API Access Details" link to reveal your Inventory Report ID.-PENDING

campaign_report.label: Reporte de campaña
campaign_report.help_text: From the Reports page, click the "View API Access Details" link to reveal your Campaign Report ID.-PENDING

account_id.label: Id de cuenta
account_id.help_text: You can find your Account Id at the right top menu sidebar in this page.-PENDING

api_key.label: Clave API
api_key.help_text: Your API key is found on the API keys tab of the UnityAds dashboard-PENDING

api_key.label: Clave de API
api_key.help_text: From the Vungle Details Dashboard, find your Reporting API key towards the bottom of the page. If you do not already have an API key, email Vungle at account-managers@vungle.com to request one.-PENDING

validations.length: El campo debe tener entre {minLength} y {maxLength} caracteres
validations.same_account_name: El nombre de la cuenta ya existe
